name: 降妖师Demon Subduing Master
description: A horizontal version of casual adventure and decompression action game, where players will play a Taoist who subdues demons and eliminates them, kills the demon king, obtains the demon king's inner elixir, and strengthens their own strength. There are countless big and small monsters in the game, among which the big monsters have powerful divine powers, and the number of small monsters is huge. Players need to watch and pay attention to their health bar in order to pass the level, and the game operation is not difficult. The gameplay is simple, easy to decompress, and the game process takes about 90 minutes. It is suitable for leisure time to enjoy the mood and relax stress. Killing all demon queens in the game will enter the Heavenly Court plot, causing conflicts with the Heavenly Court. Afterwards, they will engage in battles with many distinctive immortals in traditional Chinese mythology. Welcome to download and play.
